Reference.Title: Deeply Incised Submarine Glacial Valleys Beneath the Greenland Ice Sheet

Summary.Abstract: This data set contains bed topography beneath the Greenland Ice Sheet based on mass conservation derived from airborne radar tracks and satellite radar. The data set also includes surface and ice thickness measurements.

Related_URL.Description: U. of California, Irvine, Dept. of Earth System Science, Rignot Research Group
Ice Sheet Modeling Group, Department of Earth System Science, University of California Irvine

DIF.DIF_Revision_History: 2015-06-18, Daniel Webster, Added DOI. 2015-10-30, Michon Scott, Keyword cleanup for Drupal migration. 2015-10-30, Michon Scott, Keyword cleanup for Drupal migration. 2015-07-23, Gloria Hicks, Added keyword as part of Drupal migration. 2015-05-20, Deann Miller, Data set updated to Version 2. 2015-05-20, Deann Miller, Data set updated to Version 2.

Metadata.Name: Version Summary
Metadata.Value: Version 2 of the IceBridge BedMachine Greenland data includes improved processing of some basins and adds some Operation IceBridge 2014 data. Heights are now provided with respect to mean sea level, instead of the WGS84 ellipsoid.The geoid is included in an additional field in the data.
